name: Schily Tools
short_description: The "Schily" Tool Box is a set of tools written or managed by Jörg Schilling. It includes programs like: cdrecord, cdda2wav, readcd, mkisofs, smake, bsh, btcflash, calc, calltree, change, compare, count, devdump, hdump, isodebug, isodump, isoinfo, isovfy, label, mt, od, p, POSIX patch, sccs, scgcheck, scpio, sdd, sfind, sformat, smake, Bourne sh, star, star_sym, suntar, gnutar, tartest, termcap, and ved.
summary: A Tool Box with tools written or managed by Jörg Schilling
